Package org.frc5010.common.sensors

Class Controller.Axis

java.lang.Object
org.frc5010.common.sensors.Controller.Axis
Direct Known Subclasses:
Controller.ChangeRate, Controller.HardLimit
Enclosing class:
Controller
public static class Controller.Axis extends Object
Defines a decoratable axis on a joystick This class can be decorated by classes which define functions to be applied to the axis
